io.janusproject

Class Boot

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.Boot

  • public final class Boot
extends Object
    This is the class that permits to boot the Janus platform.

    This class provides the "main" function for the platform. The list of the parameters is composed of a list of options, the classname of an agent to launch, and the parameters to pass to the launched agent.

    The supported options may be obtain by passing no parameter, or the option -h.

    Example of Janus launching with Maven: 

     mvn exec:java
     -Dexec.mainClass="io.janusproject.Boot"
     -Dexec.args="my.Agent"

    Example of Janus launching from the CLI (only with the Jar file that is containing all the jar dependencies): 

     java -jar janus-with-dependencies.jar my.Agent
    Version:
    0.7.0-SNAPSHOT 2017-10-05 16:28:07
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

        public static def addToSystemClasspath(entries : String) : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Add the given entries to the system classpath.
        Parameters:
        entries - the new classpath entries. The format of the value is the same as for the -cp command-line option of the java tool.

      • getConsoleLogger

        public static def getConsoleLogger() : PrintStream 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Replies the console stream for logging messages from the boot mechanism.

        The console stream is independent of the stream used by the logging service of the platform. Indeed, the console stream is used for displaying information, warnings and messages before the Janus platform is realy launched.

        Returns:
        the console logger.

      • setConsoleLogger

        public static def setConsoleLogger(stream : PrintStream) : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Replies the console stream for logging messages from the boot mechanism.

        The console stream is independent of the stream used by the logging service of the platform. Indeed, the console stream is used for displaying information, warnings and messages before the Janus platform is realy launched.

        Parameters:
        stream - the stream to use for the console logging.

      • setOffline

        public static def setOffline(isOffline : boolean) : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Set offline flag of the Janus platform.

        This function is equivalent to the command line option -o.

        This function must be called before launching the Janus platform.

        Parameters:
        isOffline - the offline flag.
        Since:
        2.0.2.0
        See Also:
        JanusConfig.OFFLINE

      • setRandomContextUUID

        public static def setRandomContextUUID() : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Force the Janus platform to use a random identifier for its default context.

        This function is equivalent to the command line option -R.

        This function must be called before launching the Janus platform.

        Since:
        2.0.2.0
        See Also:
        JanusConfig.BOOT_DEFAULT_CONTEXT_ID_NAME, JanusConfig.RANDOM_DEFAULT_CONTEXT_ID_NAME

      • setBootAgentTypeContextUUID

        public static def setBootAgentTypeContextUUID() : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Force the Janus platform to use a default context identifier that tis build upon the classname of the boot agent. It means that the UUID is always the same for a given classname.

        This function is equivalent to the command line option -B.

        Since:
        2.0.2.0
        See Also:
        JanusConfig.BOOT_DEFAULT_CONTEXT_ID_NAME, JanusConfig.RANDOM_DEFAULT_CONTEXT_ID_NAME

      • setDefaultContextUUID

        public static def setDefaultContextUUID() : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Force the Janus platform to use the identifier hard-coded in the source code for its default context.

        This function is equivalent to the command line option -W.

        This function must be called before launching the Janus platform.

        Since:
        2.0.2.0
        See Also:
        JanusConfig.BOOT_DEFAULT_CONTEXT_ID_NAME, JanusConfig.RANDOM_DEFAULT_CONTEXT_ID_NAME

      • setProperty

        public static def setProperty(name : String,
                              value : String) : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Set the system property. This function is an helper for setting a system property usually accessible with System.

        This function must be called before launching the Janus platform.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property.
        value - the value of the property. If the value is null or empty, the property is removed.
        Since:
        2.0.2.0
        See Also:
        System.setProperty(String, String), System.getProperties()

      • getBootAgentIdentifier

        public static def getBootAgentIdentifier() : UUID 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Replies the identifier of the boot agent from the system's properties. The boot agent is launched with Boot.startJanus(Class, Object...).
        Returns:
        the identifier of the boot agent, or null if it is unknown.
        Since:
        2.0.2.0
        See Also:
        JanusConfig.BOOT_AGENT_ID, Boot.startJanus(Class, Object...)

      • startJanus

        public static def startJanus(agentCls : Class<? extends Agent>,
                             params : Object*) : Kernel 
                      throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Launch the Janus kernel and the first agent in the kernel.

        Thus function does not parse the command line. See Boot.main(String[]) for the command line management. When this function is called, it is assumed that all the system's properties are correctly set.

        The platformModule parameter permits to specify the injection module to use. The injection module is in change of creating/injecting all the components of the platform. The default injection module is retreived from the system property with the name stored in JanusConfig.INJECTION_MODULE_NAME. The default type for the injection module is stored in the constant JanusConfig.INJECTION_MODULE_NAME_VALUE.

        The function Boot.getBootAgentIdentifier() permits to retreive the identifier of the launched agent.

        Parameters:
        agentCls - type of the first agent to launch.
        params - parameters to pass to the agent as its initliazation parameters.
        Returns:
        the kernel that was launched.
        Throws:
        Exception - - if it is impossible to start the platform.
        See Also:
        Boot.main(String[]), Boot.getBootAgentIdentifier()

      • startJanusWithModuleType

        public static def startJanusWithModuleType(platformModule : Class<? extends com.google.inject.Module>,
                                           agentCls : Class<? extends Agent>,
                                           params : Object*) : Kernel 
                                    throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Launch the Janus kernel and the first agent in the kernel.

        Thus function does not parse the command line. See Boot.main(String[]) for the command line management. When this function is called, it is assumed that all the system's properties are correctly set.

        The platformModule parameter permits to specify the injection module to use. The injection module is in change of creating/injecting all the components of the platform. The default injection module is retreived from the system property with the name stored in JanusConfig.INJECTION_MODULE_NAME. The default type for the injection module is stored in the constant JanusConfig.INJECTION_MODULE_NAME_VALUE.

        The function Boot.getBootAgentIdentifier() permits to retreive the identifier of the launched agent.

        Parameters:
        platformModule - type of the injection module to use for initializing the platform, if null the default module will be used.
        agentCls - type of the first agent to launch.
        params - parameters to pass to the agent as its initliazation parameters.
        Returns:
        the kernel that was launched.
        Throws:
        Exception - - if it is impossible to start the platform.
        Since:
        0.5
        See Also:
        Boot.main(String[]), Boot.getBootAgentIdentifier()

      • startJanusWithModule

        public static def startJanusWithModule(startupModule : com.google.inject.Module,
                                       agentCls : Class<? extends Agent>,
                                       params : Object*) : Kernel 
                                throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Launch the Janus kernel and the first agent in the kernel.

        Thus function does not parse the command line. See Boot.main(String[]) for the command line management. When this function is called, it is assumed that all the system's properties are correctly set.

        The startupModule parameter permits to specify the injection module to use. The injection module is in change of creating/injecting all the components of the platform. The default injection module is retreived from the system property with the name stored in JanusConfig.INJECTION_MODULE_NAME. The default type for the injection module is stored in the constant JanusConfig.INJECTION_MODULE_NAME_VALUE.

        The function Boot.getBootAgentIdentifier() permits to retreive the identifier of the launched agent.

        Parameters:
        startupModule - the injection module to use for initializing the platform.
        agentCls - type of the first agent to launch.
        params - parameters to pass to the agent as its initliazation parameters.
        Returns:
        the kernel that was launched.
        Throws:
        Exception - - if it is impossible to start the platform.
        Since:
        0.5
        See Also:
        Boot.main(String[]), Boot.getBootAgentIdentifier()

      • startWithoutAgent

        public static def startWithoutAgent(startupModule : com.google.inject.Module) : Kernel 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Start the SRE without an agent. This function prepare the default context.
        Parameters:
        startupModule - the injection module to use for initializing the platform.
        Returns:
        the context that is created by the bootstrap. If null there is no context created.
        Since:
        2.0.7.0

      • startWithoutAgent

        public static def startWithoutAgent() : Kernel 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Start the SRE without an agent. This function prepare the default context.
        Returns:
        the context that is created by the bootstrap. If null there is no context created.
        Since:
        2.0.7.0

      • setExiter

        public static def setExiter(exiter : Boot.Exiter) : void 
        Description copied from class: Boot
        Changes the tool that permits to stop the application.
        Parameters:
        exiter - the exit tool.
